**反射之盾**（shield of reflection）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[盾牌](/wiki/%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "盾牌")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它是一种[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")防具，由[银](/index.php?title=%E9%93%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "银 (page does not exist)")制成。未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时，它的外观为**抛光银盾**（polished silver shield）。若玩家处于[失明](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%B1%E6%98%8E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "失明 (page does not exist)")状态，它的外观会被描述为**平滑的盾**（smooth shield）。

## 生成

[美杜莎岛](/index.php?title=%E7%BE%8E%E6%9D%9C%E8%8E%8E%E5%B2%9B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "美杜莎岛 (page does not exist)")上的[珀尔修斯](/index.php?title=%E7%8F%80%E5%B0%94%E4%BF%AE%E6%96%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "珀尔修斯 (page does not exist)")雕像内部有概率生成一面[诅咒](/index.php?title=%E8%AF%85%E5%92%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "诅咒 (page does not exist)")的+0反射之盾：美杜莎岛的“[提坦](/index.php?title=%E6%8F%90%E5%9D%A6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "提坦 (page does not exist)")”变体中出现反射之盾的概率是1⁄4，其它变体的概率则是3⁄4[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

[天使](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%A9%E4%BD%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "天使 (page does not exist)")和[亚历克斯](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%9A%E5%8E%86%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "亚历克斯 (page does not exist)")生成时有1⁄4的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一面反射之盾，[执政官](/index.php?title=%E6%89%A7%E6%94%BF%E5%AE%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "执政官 (page does not exist)")生成时必定携带一面反射之盾[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

## 描述

反射之盾的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为2，穿戴时会提供外在[反射](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8D%E5%B0%84\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "反射 (page does not exist)")特质。反射之盾由[银](/index.php?title=%E9%93%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "银 (page does not exist)")制成，因此将它用作武器攻击时能够对排斥银器的怪物造成额外伤害。

若玩家目击到反射之盾反射了[射线](/index.php?title=%E5%B0%84%E7%BA%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "射线 (page does not exist)")或[凝视](/index.php?title=%E5%87%9D%E8%A7%86\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "凝视 (page does not exist)")攻击，盾牌会[自动鉴定](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自动鉴定 (page does not exist)")。[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。

## 策略

- *主条目：[盾牌#策略](/wiki/%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5 "盾牌")*

虽然反射是非常重要的特质，但由于盾牌会影响[双持武器](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E6%8C%81%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双持武器 (page does not exist)")和[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")，因此反射之盾在[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")中并不常用。但对于无法双持武器，也不需要依赖法术战斗的角色（比如[穴居人](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%B4%E5%B1%85%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "穴居人 (page does not exist)")和[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")），反射之盾就是理想的选择。反射之盾适合与[灰龙鳞甲](/wiki/%E7%81%B0%E9%BE%99%E9%B3%9E%E7%94%B2 "灰龙鳞甲")搭配，以空出护身符和斗篷的槽位来穿戴其他实用装备，比如[保护斗篷](/wiki/%E4%BF%9D%E6%8A%A4%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "保护斗篷")或[复活护身符](/wiki/%E5%A4%8D%E6%B4%BB%E6%8A%A4%E8%BA%AB%E7%AC%A6 "复活护身符")，对于已经有[银龙鳞甲](/wiki/%E9%93%B6%E9%BE%99%E9%B3%9E%E7%94%B2 "银龙鳞甲")提供反射的配装，则推荐选用[精灵盾](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E7%9B%BE "精灵盾")或者重量更轻的[小盾牌](/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "小盾牌")。

如果还没有获得其他反射来源，即使是可以双持武器或施法能力强的角色也可以在前中期暂时考虑使用反射之盾。你还可以给自己的强力人形宠物配备反射之盾来防御[魔杖](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%9D%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔杖 (page does not exist)")的射线或[龙](/index.php?title=%E9%BE%99\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "龙 (page does not exist)")的吐息攻击——值得注意的是，[半人马](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%8A%E4%BA%BA%E9%A9%AC%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E7%B1%BB%E5%88%AB%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "半人马（怪物类别） (page does not exist)")是游戏中少有的能够穿戴防具的[坐骑](/index.php?title=%E5%9D%90%E9%AA%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "坐骑 (page does not exist)")宠物之一。

## 历史

反射之盾最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Perseus](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perseus "wikipedia:Perseus")***

据希腊神话所述，珀尔修斯在与[美杜莎](/index.php?title=%E7%BE%8E%E6%9D%9C%E8%8E%8E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "美杜莎 (page does not exist)")对峙时，利用抛光的盾牌的反光观察她的行动，同时避免直视她的眼睛，从而顺利地斩杀了她。游戏中珀尔修斯的雕像内部的盾牌即是源自这一设定。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Shield_of_reflection/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

In variants with [object materials](/wiki/Object_materials "Object materials") systems, the shield of reflection may appear as a **polished shield** when unidentified.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [Devas](/wiki/Deva "Deva") have a 1⁄4 chance of being generated with a shield of reflection, and [Planetars](/wiki/Planetar "Planetar") and [Solars](/wiki/Solar "Solar") always generate with shields of reflection. [One-eyed Sam](/wiki/Black_market_\(SLASH%27EM\)#One-eyed_Sam "Black market (SLASH'EM)") is also always generated with a shield of reflection.

[Mirrorbright](/wiki/Mirrorbright "Mirrorbright") is a [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral") [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") shield of reflection that acts as the first guaranteed [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift") for [Healers](/wiki/Healer "Healer"). While worn, it confers [hallucination resistance](/wiki/Hallucination_resistance "Hallucination resistance") in addition to reflection.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), [One-eyed Sam](/wiki/Black_market_\(UnNetHack\)#One-eyed_Sam "Black market (UnNetHack)") is always generated with a shield of reflection. [Durin's Bane](/wiki/Durin%27s_Bane "Durin's Bane") has a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a shield of reflection.

The shield of reflection is non-magical, which makes it a viable candidate for a [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish") obtained from any source including a [wand of wishing](/wiki/Wand_of_wishing "Wand of wishing") (which can also create magical items).

UnNetHack incorporates the [Itlachiayaque](/wiki/Itlachiayaque "Itlachiayaque") patch, which replaces [The Orb of Detection](/wiki/The_Orb_of_Detection "The Orb of Detection") with the artifact shield of reflection Itlachiayaque as the [Archeologist](/wiki/Archeologist "Archeologist") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact").

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), a shield of reflection grants 2 base AC, 0 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and reflection while worn, its weight is increased to 60 [aum](/wiki/Aum "Aum"), and it appears as a "polished shield" when unidentified (though it is always made of silver).

[Argenach Rilmani](/wiki/Argenach_Rilmani "Argenach Rilmani") that generate with a [broadsword](/wiki/Broadsword "Broadsword") have a 1⁄6 chance of generating with a shield of reflection.

The [minor spires](/wiki/Map_inclusion_\(dNethack\)#Minor_spire "Map inclusion (dNethack)") encountered in the Outlands of the [Neutral Quest](/wiki/Neutral_Quest_\(dNetHack\) "Neutral Quest (dNetHack)") may contain a shield of reflection and a [silver wand](/wiki/Silver_wand "Silver wand"). It may also contain a silver [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword") and a shield of reflection if [Mirror Brand](/wiki/Mirror_Brand_\(dNetHack\) "Mirror Brand (dNetHack)") has already been generated.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), the shield of reflection appears as a "polished shield" when unidentified.

xNetHack incorporates [Itlachiayaque](/wiki/Itlachiayaque_\(xNetHack\) "Itlachiayaque (xNetHack)"), but does so much differently compared to other variants.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), [One-eyed Sam](/wiki/Black_market_\(SpliceHack\)#One-eyed_Sam "Black market (SpliceHack)") is always generated with a shield of reflection.

A [small shield](/wiki/Small_shield "Small shield") or [large shield](/wiki/Large_shield "Large shield") can be combined with an amulet of reflection at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") to create a shield of reflection.

### notdNetHack

In [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), in addition to dNetHack details, [Ose](/wiki/Ose "Ose") generates with a shield of reflection when summoned by an [Illithanachronounbinder](/wiki/Illithanachronounbinder "Illithanachronounbinder").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [the Paladin](/wiki/Paladin_\(monster\) "Paladin (monster)") and [Graz'zt](/wiki/Graz%27zt "Graz'zt") are always generated with a shield of reflection.

A shield of reflection can be combined with [barding](/wiki/Barding_\(item\) "Barding (item)") at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") to create [barding of reflection](/wiki/Barding_of_reflection "Barding of reflection").

### SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") incorporates the Itlachiayaque patch, with [Itlachiayaque](/wiki/Itlachiayaque_\(SlashTHEM\) "Itlachiayaque (SlashTHEM)") serving as the Archeologist's first sacrifice gift.

反射之盾（shield of reflection）是NetHack中的一种盾牌类防具。它是一种魔法防具，由银制成。未鉴定时，它的外观为抛光银盾（polished silver shield）。若玩家处于失明状态，它的外观会被描述为平滑的盾（smooth shield）。

生成

美杜莎岛上的珀尔修斯雕像内部有概率生成一面诅咒的+0反射之盾：美杜莎岛的“提坦”变体中出现反射之盾的概率是1⁄4，其它变体的概率则是3⁄4[1][2][3][4]。

天使和亚历克斯生成时有1⁄4的概率携带一面反射之盾，执政官生成时必定携带一面反射之盾[5]。

描述

反射之盾的基础AC加成为2，穿戴时会提供外在反射特质。反射之盾由银制成，因此将它用作武器攻击时能够对排斥银器的怪物造成额外伤害。

若玩家目击到反射之盾反射了射线或凝视攻击，盾牌会自动鉴定。[6]。

策略

主条目：盾牌#策略

虽然反射是非常重要的特质，但由于盾牌会影响双持武器和施法，因此反射之盾在飞升套件中并不常用。但对于无法双持武器，也不需要依赖法术战斗的角色（比如穴居人和游侠），反射之盾就是理想的选择。反射之盾适合与灰龙鳞甲搭配，以空出护身符和斗篷的槽位来穿戴其他实用装备，比如保护斗篷或复活护身符，对于已经有银龙鳞甲提供反射的配装，则推荐选用精灵盾或者重量更轻的小盾牌。

如果还没有获得其他反射来源，即使是可以双持武器或施法能力强的角色也可以在前中期暂时考虑使用反射之盾。你还可以给自己的强力人形宠物配备反射之盾来防御魔杖的射线或龙的吐息攻击——值得注意的是，半人马是游戏中少有的能够穿戴防具的坐骑宠物之一。

历史

反射之盾最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

起源

维基百科相关条目：
Perseus

据希腊神话所述，珀尔修斯在与美杜莎对峙时，利用抛光的盾牌的反光观察她的行动，同时避免直视她的眼睛，从而顺利地斩杀了她。游戏中珀尔修斯的雕像内部的盾牌即是源自这一设定。

Variants

您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

In variants with object materials systems, the shield of reflection may appear as a polished shield when unidentified.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, Devas have a 1⁄4 chance of being generated with a shield of reflection, and Planetars and Solars always generate with shields of reflection. One-eyed Sam is also always generated with a shield of reflection.

Mirrorbright is a neutral artifact shield of reflection that acts as the first guaranteed sacrifice gift for Healers. While worn, it confers hallucination resistance in addition to reflection.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, One-eyed Sam is always generated with a shield of reflection. Durin's Bane has a 1⁄3 chance of generating with a shield of reflection.

The shield of reflection is non-magical, which makes it a viable candidate for a wish obtained from any source including a wand of wishing (which can also create magical items).

UnNetHack incorporates the Itlachiayaque patch, which replaces The Orb of Detection with the artifact shield of reflection Itlachiayaque as the Archeologist quest artifact.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, a shield of reflection grants 2 base AC, 0 DR and reflection while worn, its weight is increased to 60 aum, and it appears as a "polished shield" when unidentified (though it is always made of silver).

Argenach Rilmani that generate with a broadsword have a 1⁄6 chance of generating with a shield of reflection.

The minor spires encountered in the Outlands of the Neutral Quest may contain a shield of reflection and a silver wand. It may also contain a silver long sword and a shield of reflection if Mirror Brand has already been generated.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, the shield of reflection appears as a "polished shield" when unidentified.

xNetHack incorporates Itlachiayaque, but does so much differently compared to other variants.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, One-eyed Sam is always generated with a shield of reflection.

A small shield or large shield can be combined with an amulet of reflection at a furnace to create a shield of reflection.

notdNetHack

In notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, in addition to dNetHack details, Ose generates with a shield of reflection when summoned by an Illithanachronounbinder.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, the Paladin and Graz'zt are always generated with a shield of reflection.

A shield of reflection can be combined with barding at a forge to create barding of reflection.

SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, SlashTHEM incorporates the Itlachiayaque patch, with Itlachiayaque serving as the Archeologist's first sacrifice gift.

  • [[反射]]
|cost=50 |weight=50 |material=银 }} '''反射之盾'''（shield of reflection）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[盾牌]]类[[防具]]。它是一种[[魔法物品|魔法]]防具，由[[银]]制成。未[[鉴定]]时，它的外观为'''抛光银盾'''（polished silver shield）。若玩家处于[[失明]]状态，它的外观会被描述为'''平滑的盾'''（smooth shield）。 == 生成 == [[美杜莎岛]]上的[[珀尔修斯]]雕像内部有概率生成一面[[诅咒]]的+0反射之盾：美杜莎岛的“[[提坦]]”变体中出现反射之盾的概率是{{frac|4}}，其它变体的概率则是{{frac|3|4}}{{refsrc|dat/medusa.des|57|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|dat/medusa.des|156|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|dat/medusa.des|274|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|dat/medusa.des|374|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 [[天使]]和[[亚历克斯]]生成时有{{frac|4}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]一面反射之盾，[[执政官]]生成时必定携带一面反射之盾{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|340|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == 反射之盾的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为2，穿戴时会提供外在[[反射]]特质。反射之盾由[[银]]制成，因此将它用作武器攻击时能够对排斥银器的怪物造成额外伤害。 若玩家目击到反射之盾反射了[[射线]]或[[凝视]]攻击，盾牌会[[自动鉴定]]。{{refsrc|src/muse.c|2169|nethack=3.6.7}}。 == 策略 == {{main/zh-CN|盾牌#策略}} 虽然反射是非常重要的特质，但由于盾牌会影响[[双持武器]]和[[施法]]，因此反射之盾在[[飞升套件]]中并不常用。但对于无法双持武器，也不需要依赖法术战斗的角色（比如[[穴居人]]和[[游侠]]），反射之盾就是理想的选择。反射之盾适合与[[灰龙鳞甲]]搭配，以空出护身符和斗篷的槽位来穿戴其他实用装备，比如[[保护斗篷]]或[[复活护身符]]，对于已经有[[银龙鳞甲]]提供反射的配装，则推荐选用[[精灵盾]]或者重量更轻的[[小盾牌]]。 如果还没有获得其他反射来源，即使是可以双持武器或施法能力强的角色也可以在前中期暂时考虑使用反射之盾。你还可以给自己的强力人形宠物配备反射之盾来防御[[魔杖]]的射线或[[龙]]的吐息攻击——值得注意的是，[[半人马（怪物类别）|半人马]]是游戏中少有的能够穿戴防具的[[坐骑]]宠物之一。 == 历史 == 反射之盾最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。 == 起源 == {{Wikipedia/zh-CN|Perseus}} 据希腊神话所述，珀尔修斯在与[[美杜莎]]对峙时，利用抛光的盾牌的反光观察她的行动，同时避免直视她的眼睛，从而顺利地斩杀了她。游戏中珀尔修斯的雕像内部的盾牌即是源自这一设定。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} In variants with [[object materials]] systems, the shield of reflection may appear as a '''polished shield''' when unidentified. ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], [[Deva]]s have a {{frac|4}} chance of being generated with a shield of reflection, and [[Planetar]]s and [[Solar]]s always generate with shields of reflection. [[Black market (SLASH'EM)#One-eyed Sam|One-eyed Sam]] is also always generated with a shield of reflection. [[Mirrorbright]] is a [[neutral]] [[artifact]] shield of reflection that acts as the first guaranteed [[sacrifice gift]] for [[Healer]]s. While worn, it confers [[hallucination resistance]] in addition to reflection. ===UnNetHack=== In [[UnNetHack]], [[Black market (UnNetHack)#One-eyed Sam|One-eyed Sam]] is always generated with a shield of reflection. [[Durin's Bane]] has a {{frac|3}} chance of generating with a shield of reflection. The shield of reflection is non-magical, which makes it a viable candidate for a [[wish]] obtained from any source including a [[wand of wishing]] (which can also create magical items). UnNetHack incorporates the [[Itlachiayaque]] patch, which replaces [[The Orb of Detection]] with the artifact shield of reflection Itlachiayaque as the [[Archeologist]] [[quest artifact]]. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]], a shield of reflection grants 2 base AC, 0 [[DR]] and reflection while worn, its weight is increased to 60 [[aum]], and it appears as a "polished shield" when unidentified (though it is always made of silver). [[Argenach Rilmani]] that generate with a [[broadsword]] have a {{frac|6}} chance of generating with a shield of reflection. The [[Map inclusion (dNethack)#Minor spire|minor spires]] encountered in the Outlands of the [[Neutral Quest (dNetHack)|Neutral Quest]] may contain a shield of reflection and a [[silver wand]]. It may also contain a silver [[long sword]] and a shield of reflection if [[Mirror Brand (dNetHack)|Mirror Brand]] has already been generated. ===xNetHack=== In [[xNetHack]], the shield of reflection appears as a "polished shield" when unidentified. xNetHack incorporates [[Itlachiayaque (xNetHack)|Itlachiayaque]], but does so much differently compared to other variants. ===SpliceHack=== In [[SpliceHack]], [[Black market (SpliceHack)#One-eyed Sam|One-eyed Sam]] is always generated with a shield of reflection. A [[small shield]] or [[large shield]] can be combined with an amulet of reflection at a [[furnace]] to create a shield of reflection. ===notdNetHack=== In [[notdNetHack]] and [[notnotdNetHack]], in addition to dNetHack details, [[Ose]] generates with a shield of reflection when summoned by an [[Illithanachronounbinder]]. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], [[Paladin (monster)|the Paladin]] and [[Graz'zt]] are always generated with a shield of reflection. A shield of reflection can be combined with [[Barding (item)|barding]] at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] to create [[barding of reflection]]. ===SlashTHEM=== In addition to SLASH'EM details, [[SlashTHEM]] incorporates the Itlachiayaque patch, with [[Itlachiayaque (SlashTHEM)|Itlachiayaque]] serving as the Archeologist's first sacrifice gift. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Shields/zh-CN|FANSHEZHIDUN]]
